products.name: Converse Glits
products.description: Do stylish and fresh in these Superga Leather Full Wedge Low-Cut Sneakers. These sneakers boast full wedge soles for a modern take on a platform, only this time not as part of a pair of heels. Their monochrome colourway makes them an easy sell with any other white pieces, but alternatively a preppy look comprising a denim miniskirt and striped tee will do just the trick with this pair.
products.info: Upgrade her shoe selection with these modern and on-trend sneakers. They are finished in fashionable rose gold with a sporty silhouette to add an athleisure chic to your look.
